mapper.insert: insert into paper(paper_title, paper_meeting, paper_date, paper_summary, paper_link, paper_type, paper_publisher_id, paper_publish_time) values (#{paperTitle}, #{paperMeeting}, #{paperDate}, #{paperSummary}, #{paperLink}, #{paperType}, #{paperPublisherId}, #{paperPublishTime})
insert into paper_additional_file(paper_id, file_path ,file_name, file_size) values (#{paperId}, #{filePath}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize})
mapper.update: update paper set paper_title=#{paperTitle}, paper_meeting=#{paperMeeting}, paper_date=#{paperDate}, paper_summary=#{paperSummary}, paper_link=#{paperLink}, paper_type=#{paperType}, paper_publisher_id=#{paperPublisherId}, paper_publish_time=#{paperPublishTime} where paper_id = #{paperId}
mapper.select:
select distinct p.paper_id, paper_title, paper_meeting, paper_date, paper_summary, paper_link, paper_type, paper_publisher_id, paper_publish_time from paper p
where paper_title like concat('%',#{cond},'%')
inner join paper_rd rd on p.paper_id = rd.paper_id inner join research_direction r on rd.rd_id = r.rd_id where rd_name like concat('%',#{cond},'%')
inner join paper_author a on p.paper_id = a.paper_id where author_name like concat('%',#{cond},'%')
where paper_summary like concat('%',#{cond},'%')
order by paper_date desc
order by paper_date asc
select rd.rd_id, rd_name from paper_rd inner join research_direction rd on paper_rd.rd_id = rd.rd_id where paper_id = #{paperId}

select distinct p.paper_id, paper_title, paper_meeting, paper_date, paper_summary, paper_link, paper_type, paper_publisher_id, paper_publish_time from paper p inner join paper_rd rd on p.paper_id = rd.paper_id inner join research_direction r on rd.rd_id = r.rd_id inner join paper_author a on p.paper_id = a.paper_id inner join user u on p.paper_publisher_id = u.user_id where
paper_title like concat('%',#{value.info[0]},'%')
rd_name like concat('%',#{value.info[0]},'%')
author_name like concat('%',#{value.info[0]},'%')
paper_summary like concat('%',#{value.info[0]},'%')
user_name like concat('%',#{value.info[0]},'%')
paper_meeting like concat('%',#{value.info[0]},'%')
or
and
paper_title like concat('%',#{value.info[1]},'%')
rd_name like concat('%',#{value.info[1]},'%')
author_name like concat('%',#{value.info[1]},'%')
paper_summary like concat('%',#{value.info[1]},'%')
user_name like concat('%',#{value.info[1]},'%')
paper_meeting like concat('%',#{value.info[1]},'%')
or
and
paper_title like concat('%',#{value.info[2]},'%')
rd_name like concat('%',#{value.info[2]},'%')
author_name like concat('%',#{value.info[2]},'%')
paper_summary like concat('%',#{value.info[2]},'%')
user_name like concat('%',#{value.info[2]},'%')
paper_meeting like concat('%',#{value.info[2]},'%')
and paper_type in
#{item}
and paper_date >= #{value.timeRange[0]}
and paper_date <= #{value.timeRange[1]}
order by paper_date desc
order by paper_date asc

select p.paper_id, paper_title, paper_meeting, paper_date, paper_summary, paper_link, paper_type, paper_publisher_id, paper_publish_time from paper p inner join paper_rd pr on p.paper_id = pr.paper_id inner join research_direction rd on pr.rd_id = rd.rd_id where rd_name like concat('%', #{rd}, '%')
